/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A bridge arches over the street, connecting two parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy scene below. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
